ggswim 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Reshape lane_colors

    get_assigned_line_colors.Rd

    In order to assign the correct colors to ggplot2::scale_color_manual(), it is necessary to account for the order of the legend output in combination with the assigned markers.

    get_assigned_line_colors(gg, lane_colors)

    Arguments

    gg

    a ggplot object

    lane_colors

    a vector of character strings to assign to the lanes, written in the same order. Optional, if left NULL, default colors applied

    Value

    a vector

    Contents

    Developed by Richard Hanna, Stephan Kadauke, Ezra Porter.
